      Parameters:
      q - Name of the query.
      params - Parameters passed to the query.
      Returns:

    • findOpt

      Execute a named query and return a single result.
      Parameters:
      q - Name of the query.
      params - Parameters passed to the query.
      Returns:
      An Optional with the entity or an empty Optional if not found.

      params - Parameters passed to the query.
      Returns:
